name: All The Zombies
description:
Created for Fuck This Jam 2014, All The Zombies is my quick and dirty take on a zombie survival/endless runner game. 

Controls

WASD to move, mouse to look around, space to jump.

Objective

Four exits, four modes. Pick a door and try to survive for as long as you can.

Assets used

Zombie models from Arteria3D.com

City exterior from Turbosquid

Sound Effects from FreeSound.org

Music by Valhalla Smith

All other code and art by aDFP

twitter @dan_stubbs

All downloads are 100% free, but any donations will go towards further development, and keeping All The Zombies free.

Planned features include a scoring system, melee weapons and firearms, more zombie types (and special zombies!), more animations, multiplayer, better buildings (with interiors) and realtime destruction. Most of those systems are already written (for The Hit http://www.TheHitGame.co.uk), and won't take long to add.

Thanks for playing!
